title: KitKat (Apex Nova Adw theme) v1.0.0
description:
Looking for something minimalistic but with colour detailing?

Here is something which is perfect for you , a Hybrid icon set with minimal looks but with full icon detailing which is all ready to beautify your device. 

The icons are full HD (144x144) and comes with inbuilt app to apply theme , apply wallpapers , icon request form , and many more.

DESIGNED FOR XHDPI. YOUR RESULTS MAY VARY WITH OTHER SCREEN RESOLUTIONS

Features :

- Over 800 apps themed (More will be added Regularly) 
- Dedicated App to apply theme and change wallpaper (Can be accessed from App Drawer)
- Multi Launcher support ( APEX, NOVA, ADW, ACTION PRO, HOLO , SOLO ,ATOM And Many more)
- 10 HD wallpapers (can be applied from the app)
- Themed dock (apex,nova supported)
- Weekly and monthly icon updates

Features of inbuilt app :

-Apply theme within the app (supported : nova , apex, adw, action launchers , ) (more coming soon)
-Wallpaper picker - Choose from 10 kitkat styled walls
-Contact me
-Request icons
-Rate theme
and more.

More info:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.BladeXDesigns.ShadeX" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
